metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22959 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The parser in accepts requests with a space (SP) right after the header name before the colon. This can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS) in llhttp < v2.1.4 and < v6.0.6.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-22959` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
nodejs - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1').
